meanings.definition: In a manner requiring great effort or endurance.
meanings.sent1: She climbed the steep hill ardulously, never giving up.
meanings.sent2: He worked ardulously on his homework until late at night.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel ardulously tried to reach the bird feeder, but kept slipping.
meanings.sent4: The marathon runner ardulously pushed through the last mile to the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The student ardulously studied for hours to pass the exam.
